DepartmentsData.Title: Elementary School
DepartmentsData.Description: Foundational learning with a focus on empathy for grades 1-5, Personalized learning plans, STEAM integration, Character development

DepartmentsData.Title: Middle School
DepartmentsData.Description: Comprehensive education fostering compassion for grades 6-8, Project-based learning, Leadership opportunities,Community service projects

DepartmentsData.Title: High School
DepartmentsData.Description: College preparatory curriculum emphasizing social responsibility for grades 9-12, Advanced Placement courses, Internship programs, Global citizenship initiatives

HighlightsData.Title: The Techfest at the Academy of Technology
HighlightsData.Description: The Techfest at the Academy of Technology is an annual event that showcases innovation and creativity in various fields of technology. It features a range of activities including workshops, competitions, exhibitions, and lectures from industry experts. Students have the opportunity to display their projects, engage in hands-on learning, and network with professionals. This event aims to inspire and cultivate a passion for technology among attendees, fostering an environment of learning and collaboration.

HighlightsData.Title: Gamesmeet at the Academy of Technology
HighlightsData.Description: Gamesmeet at the Academy of Technology is an annual gathering focused on gaming and e-sports. It features competitive gaming tournaments, casual gaming sessions, and interactive workshops. Participants can compete in popular games, learn about game development, and connect with fellow gaming enthusiasts. The event aims to promote the gaming culture within the academy, encouraging both fun and educational experiences in the world of video games.

HighlightsData.Title: The 'Women in Space Engineering' event at the Academy of Technology
HighlightsData.Description: The 'Women in Space Engineering' event at the Academy of Technology is a prestigious gathering that highlights the contributions of women in the field of space engineering. Esteemed IIT professors and renowned female scientists from ISRO come together to share their experiences, insights, and advancements in space technology. The event includes inspiring talks, panel discussions, and networking opportunities, aiming to encourage and empower female students to pursue careers in space engineering and related fields.

HighlightsData.Title: The GDG September Meet at the Academy of Technology
HighlightsData.Description: The GDG September Meet at the Academy of Technology is a monthly gathering hosted by the Google Developer Group. It features tech talks, coding sessions, and networking opportunities for developers to share knowledge and collaborate on projects.
